title: SSD DnD 4E Utilities - PDF Character Sheet 2.0 - SSD
description:
This is the 2.0 version of the D&D 4E character sheet, editable as an Adobe PDF form. (Acrobat Reader required). Several fixes have been made since the 1.0 release a week ago. Please read the info.txt file for full details.

This is a Acrobat 8 PDF file that can be used to creat and modify your D&D 4E characters. Created by Sentient Software Division. Watch for c-Tools a new D&D 4E system coming soon.

Enjoy these sheets with our complements in the mean time.
-SSD
